title: Linus Torvalds Reacts to Poorly-Executed Pull Requests for Linux 6.3
description: You do not want to see the furious-side of Linus Torvalds. Do you?

title: Musk Says Twitter Algorithm to Go Open-Source Next Week
description: Would you take Elon's word for it? So, Twitter's algorithm goes open-source sooner than you would expect?
